about_the_game:
Pssst, hey kid!
I have a brandnew mixtape for sale. For you I'll make a special offer of only 100 Shlotinki. You won't regret buying it, trust me.
Make sure to tell all your friends about Stix' Shack



The original soundtrack for Kraken Academy!!

Soundtrack composed and produced by Svyatoslav Petrov
Violin - Diana Koval
Guitar - Jenya Karvazkyi
Saxophone - Lubomyr Radomskyi

Available in MP3 and FLAC.
